titles.title: A resolution recognizing the bicentennial of Ohio's founding.
A resolution recognizing the bicentennial of Ohio's founding.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on February 27, 2003. However, because action occurred on the measure, the summary has been expanded.)Recognizes the bicentennial of Ohio's founding and its residents for their important contributions to the economic, social, and cultural development of the United States.
